title: Today I Am
description: Clear, strong lines, and radiant colours that seem to smile at the reader characterise Mies van Hout’s drawings. In “Today I Am” Mies shows all the emotions a young child encounters. Each double page spread is devoted to one fish showing a particular emotion, along with its name in lettering that expresses the same feeling. Dive into “Today I Am” and meet the most dazzling fish that spark laughter and empathy.
author: Mies van Hout
